CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 10, 1945, pg. 22, reads: "YMCA Hostesses - Members of the Centre Avenue YMCA Hostess Club and Varsity Club, who will sponsor their annual Sweethearts Hop, Friday, Feb. 9, at the 'Y,' in celebration of St. Valentine's Day.  Left to right: Miss Francis [Frances] Bell, secretary of Hostess Club, and Miss Eunice Talbart, president; members of the Varsity Club, James Alexander, George Hoggarth and Clarence Johnson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Frances Bell (Nunn) and Eunice Talbart holding heart, with James Alexander, George Hoggarth and Clarence Johnson behind them, Centre Avenue YMCA with Henry O. Tanner painting "Christ and His Mother" in background
